name: Creativity
text: I love being a developer because it allows me to wield my creativity to its full potential. With every project, there are limitless possibilities for improvements in functionality, resourcefulness, and playfulness.

name: Accessibility
text: Accessible software is the way of the future. Given proper access, hundreds of millions of additional people can benefit from the software we create in an equitable fashion.

name: Solubility
text:
Software is solution based:

"What problem does this solve?"
"Does it make anybody's life easier?"
Answering these questions helps us effectively communicate value.
